Ernst & Young Finalist Michelle Free, MBA, MEng
Oil & Gas Business Development Manager at Emerson Automation
Solutions
Greater Houston
Summary
Sales Leader with global multi-national corporation experience
driving Automation new business development opportunities, growth
in digital products and services, strategic account development
and support, and sales channel management. High energy leader
of commercial and technical teams who develop custom solutions
for end user clients. 10-year career track record of consistently
exceeding sales booking targets in oil & gas, industrial, power
generation, and water markets.
Automation Sales | Strategic Account Management | Service
Solution Sales | Project Sales | Consulting | T&D Sales | EPC's |
Prospecting | Business Planning | Collaboration | Negotiations |
Salesforce Forecasting | Communications | Competitor Analysis 
• Broad knowledge of key manufacturing processes for Oil & Gas,
Specialty Chemicals, Petrochemicals, Power Generation, Water/
Waste Water Treatment, HVAC/Building Automation, Pulp & Paper,
Agriculture
• Automation Specialties: Distributed Control System (DCS)
Evolution Planning, Digital Solutions, PLC Migration, Alarm
Management, Cyber Security, Performance Optimization, Fingerprint
Studies, Whitelisting, Security Workplace/Backup Solutions, OPC’s,
High Performance Graphic HMI Upgrades, Software Upgrades
with Hardware Replacement, Virtualization, or Hyper-Virtualization;
Combustion/Steam Turbine Control System Upgrades; Custom On-
Site Training
• T&D Specialties: Air & Water Cooled AC Drives/Inverters (LV
to 3000 HP; MV to 17,000 HP); Large Drive Retrofit & Upgrades
(Control Systems, S/W, Capacitor, Re-hose); PLC’s; Electrical
Equipment Reliability; Drive/Motor/ Switchgear Preventive
Maintenance Programs; Industrial & Utility Distribution Systems;
  Page 1 of 7
   
Motor Control; Energy Savings Monitoring & Control Solutions;
Power Quality, Line Harmonics & Solutions; Compressor Systems;
Pumps
Contact me directly through LinkedIn or at:
• Email: michelle_free@yahoo.com
• Mobile: (832)-684-7545
Experience
Emerson Automation Solutions 
NA Business Development Manager, Oil & Gas | MAS
December 2019 - Present  (1 year 5 months)
Houston, Texas, United States
ABB
Senior Account Manager
January 2018 - December 2019  (2 years)
Houston, Texas Area
Selling automation products and services, PLC Migration, Simulators, Custom
Training, PLC Replacement, Digital Solutions including Cyber Security, Alarm
Management, and High-Performance Graphic HMI Upgrades, to assigned
end users at corporate headquarters, plants, and EPC's in power generation
and water markets.  Responsibilities include prospecting, developing and
growing customer relationships to accelerate growth of automation sales;
networking w/executives, including Sr. VP of Operations, Director of Asset
Management, Fleet Compliance/ Engineering/Reliability Directors, and working
with Engineers, Maintenance, and Operations/Plant Managers.  
• 2019 YTD sold greatest number of new Multi-Year Managed DCS Care
Agreements
• Sold first High-Performance Graphics HMI Upgrade ($850,000) to strategic
account adopted as fleet standard
• As Strategic Account Manager, negotiating MSA, established alliance
management team with VP-level participation from customer and ABB; Plan/
host annual executive golf outings and customer appreciation dinners
• 2018 - Launched/piloted highly successful ABB DCS Evolution Planning
Program with BD Manager 
• 2019 - Sold first 5-Year Enhanced Power Generation Care Contract to
Nuclear Power Plant (greater than $250,000)
  Page 2 of 7
   
•      Plan/host greater than 100 Automation L-n-L's for Engineering and
Operations decision makers
• Salesforce CRM and Microsoft Office skills; Conversational Spanish
Business Strategy Consulting | Sales | Presentations | Marketing
